text:
The following build script makes a directory named $(cdimage) instead of test  
This happens with both the location and value attributes in the propery element.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project basedir="." default="makedirs" name="test">
    <property name="cdimage" location="test"/>

    <target name="makedirs">
        <mkdir dir="$(cdimage)"/>
    </target>

</project>
creator: olandere@lucent.com
stevel@apache.org
text:
1. before any attributes get mapped to any string assignments in any task,
property expansion is handled by the runtime. So if mkdir doesnt work, then
neither would everything else.

2. property expansion is used broadly everywhere, so it must work.

3. but only if you use the correct kind of braces -curly- rather than round ones.

not a bug.
